title: Case Study-Driven Instructional Design for Global Competency Enhancement (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design skills and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields learn global competency instructional design applicable to elementary education settings. Project-based assessments are conducted in a self-directed learning environment using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three instructional design strategies grounded in a global competency framework.
Learners can complete at least one culturally contextualized educational design by analyzing international comparative cases.
Learners can develop interactive educational modules addressing global issues using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
